author: Lauren Vella
title: China takes measures to contain coronavirus 'silent carriers,' prevent second wave
description: The Chinese government's State Council late Wednesday issued new measures to mitigate the spread of coronavirus by asymptomatic carriers as the country's leaders seek to prevent a second major outbreak of the disease....
content:
The Chinese governments State Council late Wednesday issued new measures to mitigate the spread of coronavirus by asymptomatic carriers as the countrys leaders seek to prevent a second major outbreak of the disease. 
The new rules are a response to the incre… [+2191 chars]
